trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Christchurch
There were no other sightings in Christchurch on or around September 10th 2013
Summary: Looked like a star but very bright was moving slowly saw this light for about 30 minutes it had rainbow colour rays shining out of it was differen't to anything else I've ever seen in the sky
divs: Sighting DetailsIn Christchurch, New Zealand I was observing a star then realized it was too bright to be a start and was slowly moving. It was too slow to be a plane or a meteorite but it was slowly moving and the brightness kept changing at times. We had thunder and lightning that night but it had not hit us it was still a about an hour away. But in the distance we could see lightning and it looked purple near the object. Then after a while it had rainbow colored rays shining out. Eventually it traveled out of sight. I don't know what it was but it was different to anything else I've ever seen.
